With modern, fully equipped facilities, we are prepared to handle projects of any scale. Our team is defined by unwavering focus, fast execution, and a deep commitment to quality.

Committed to excellence since 2014

GETLAB delivers a comprehensive range of high-quality material testing services designed to support civil infrastructure projects.

Our Services

We deliver a comprehensive range of materials testing services to support civil infrastructure projects, including soil testing, asphalt testing, concrete & Aggregate Testing, chemical testing, geotechnical investigations, geophysical investigations, petrology and petrochemical tests, as well as public health & enviromental tests.

Soil Testing

We perform comprehensive physical, mechanical, and chemical testing on all geo-materials (soils) to support construction and infrastructure development.

Soil Testing
  • Moisture Content, Liquid Limit & Linear Shrinkage
  • Plastic Limit and Plasticity Index
    • Particle Density Determination (Pyknometer test) Bulk Density for undisturbed samples Particle Size Distribution - Wet sieving Particle Size Distribution - Hydrometer method Compaction Test (BS Light, BS Heavy) California Bearing Ratio Test - One point method, Three point method Consolidation Test (Oedometer method) Triaxial Test, Shear Box Test Permeability Test (Constant head method) Organic Content (Ignition loss method) pH Value (pH meter), Compaction Test for Stabilized materials Unconfined Compressive Strength (UCS) of stabilised materials Initial Consumption of Lime (ICL)

Asphalt Testing

Our state-of-the-art asphalt testing laboratories are equipped with the latest technology, enabling us to deliver advanced testing services, detailed reporting, and asphalt pavement design solutions for a wide road projects.

Asphalt Testing
    Density of Bituminous Binders & Refusal Density Mix Design Flash and Fire Point (Cleveland Open Cup) Thin Film Oven Test (TFOT) Penetration Test & Recovering Asphalt Core Samples Using a Core Cutter Ductility & Bulk density of Asphalt Cores Softening Point Test Viscosity & Indirect Tensile Strength Test Binder content and aggregate grading by extraction Density and Water Absorption of Aggregates (greater than 4.75mm) Marshall Test, Marshall Mix Design, & Flow

Concrete & Aggregate Testing

Our state-of-the-art asphalt testing laboratories are equipped with the latest technology, allowing us to provide advanced testing services that are essential for verifying the quality, strength, and long-term durability of infrastructure projects.

Chemical Testing

We conduct precise chemical analysis on essential construction materials, including water and soils.

Geotechnical Investigations

These methods offer preliminary assessment of large sites. They provide valuable information on subsoil parameters such as resistivity, seismic characteristics, ground profiles, and groundwater levels.

Geophysical Investigations

These methods offer a cost-effective and time-saving solution for the preliminary assessment of large sites. They provide valuable information on subsoil parameters such as resistivity, seismic characteristics, ground profiles, and groundwater levels.

Project

EACOP: Uganda’s Strategic Oil Corridor

The East African Crude Oil Pipeline (EACOP) is a landmark infrastructure project aimed at transporting crude oil from Uganda’s oil fields to the Port of Tanga in Tanzania for export to global markets. The Ugandan segment spans approximately 296 kilometers.

Resources

In-house capacity for geotechnical excellence

GETLAB has developed internal capacity and acquired resources to undertake complex materials and geotechnical engineering tasks, delivering quality results in a timely manner.
